moves.2. d4: Might as well go ahead and lay claim to the center.
moves.4. Bg5 c6 5. e5 dxe5 6. dxe5 Qxd1+: Expected, and I was ready. The real question is, is my opponent ready?
moves.8. Nxe4 f6 9. exf6 exf6 10. Bxf6: He resigned. Which is good, because saving his Rook loses the game, eventually. Thank you for reading, please R&C!
